description.zh-cn: 香港男歌手及演员，1990年代被誉为“香港四大天王”之一，活跃于音乐、影视及公益领域。
description.en: A Hong Kong singer and actor, known as one of the "Four Heavenly Kings" of Hong Kong in the 1990s, active in music, film, and philanthropy.

description.zh-cn: 香港模特儿及演员，黎明的前妻。
description.en: A Hong Kong model and actress, former wife of Leon Lai.

description.zh-cn: 印尼归国华侨，黎明之父。
description.en: An Indonesian returned overseas Chinese, father of Leon Lai.

description.zh-cn: 黎明曾就读的中学。
description.en: A secondary school that Leon Lai attended.

description.zh-cn: 黎明曾在英国就读的私立寄宿学校。
description.en: A private boarding school in the United Kingdom that Leon Lai attended.

description.zh-cn: 黎明曾在英国就读的学校。
description.en: A school in the United Kingdom that Leon Lai attended.

description.zh-cn: 香港唱片公司，黎明于1986年至1989年间签约的公司。
description.en: A Hong Kong record label to which Leon Lai was signed from 1986 to 1989.

description.zh-cn: 国际唱片公司，黎明于1989年至1998年间签约的公司。
description.en: An international record label to which Leon Lai was signed from 1989 to 1998.

description.zh-cn: 香港唱片公司，黎明于1998年至2004年间签约的公司。
description.en: A Hong Kong record label to which Leon Lai was signed from 1998 to 2004.

description.zh-cn: 由黎明与林建岳合作成立的香港唱片公司。
description.en: A Hong Kong record label co-founded by Leon Lai and Peter Lam.

description.zh-cn: 1986年举办的歌唱比赛，黎明在此比赛中获得铜奖并进入演艺界。
description.en: A singing competition held in 1986 where Leon Lai won the second runner-up prize, launching his entertainment career.

description.zh-cn: 联合国属下机构，致力于维护全球儿童的权益。黎明自1994年起担任其大使。
description.en: A United Nations agency dedicated to protecting the rights of children worldwide. Leon Lai has served as its ambassador since 1994.

en: The Community Chest of Hong Kong

description.zh-cn: 香港的非牟利及非政府的慈善机构。黎明长期参与其活动，并担任名誉副会长。
description.en: A non-profit and non-governmental charitable organization in Hong Kong. Leon Lai has been a long-term participant and serves as an Honorary Vice President.

en: Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国香港特别行政区的行政机关。
description.en: The executive authorities of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国时期的一场政治运动，期间对归国华侨等群体造成了冲击和批斗。
description.en: A political movement in the People's Republic of China during which groups such as returned overseas Chinese were targeted and persecuted.

description.zh-cn: 香港艺人，黎明的谊父。
description.en: A Hong Kong artist and Leon Lai's godfather.

description.zh-cn: 黎明的助手，自1992年起协助其处理工作及私人事务。
description.en: Leon Lai's assistant, who has been helping him with professional and personal matters since 1992.

description.zh-cn: 音乐导师，曾在亚洲电视艺员训练班教黎明唱歌。
description.en: A music tutor who taught Leon Lai singing at the ATV Artiste Training Class.

description.zh-cn: 香港作家，曾在第五届新秀歌唱大赛担任评判并给予黎明高分。
description.en: A Hong Kong writer who was a judge at the 5th New Talent Singing Awards and gave Leon Lai a high score.

description.zh-cn: 香港演员，曾将黎明介绍给歌唱老师戴思聪。
description.en: A Hong Kong actor who introduced Leon Lai to singing coach Dai Sicong.

description.zh-cn: 香港著名歌唱老师，曾教授黎明乐理和歌唱技巧，并助其签约宝丽金。
description.en: A renowned Hong Kong singing coach who taught Leon Lai music theory and vocal techniques, and helped him sign with PolyGram.

description.zh-cn: 香港音乐填词人及监制，时任宝丽金监制期间与黎明签约。
description.en: A Hong Kong lyricist and record producer who, as a producer for PolyGram, signed Leon Lai.

description.zh-cn: 香港著名词曲作家，曾在黎明走音事件后公开表示其为可造之才。
description.en: A renowned Hong Kong songwriter who publicly stated that Leon Lai had great potential after an incident where Lai sang off-key.

description.zh-cn: 香港著名歌手及演员，曾公开赞赏黎明并为其颁奖。
description.en: A legendary Hong Kong singer and actor who publicly praised Leon Lai and presented an award to him.

description.zh-cn: 位于北京的音乐学院，黎明曾在此进修。
description.en: A music conservatory in Beijing where Leon Lai pursued further studies.

description.zh-cn: 中国音乐学院教授，黎明曾跟他学习乐理和发声技巧。
description.en: A professor at the China Conservatory of Music from whom Leon Lai learned music theory and vocal techniques.

description.zh-cn: 香港电影制作人及经理人，曾任黎明的经理人。
description.en: A Hong Kong film producer and artist manager, formerly Leon Lai's manager.

description.zh-cn: 香港填词人，曾将雷颂德介绍给黎明的经理人陈善之。
description.en: A Hong Kong lyricist who introduced Mark Lui to Leon Lai's manager, Joe Chan.

description.zh-cn: 香港音乐人，与黎明长期合作，被视为乐坛中的最佳拍档之一。
description.en: A Hong Kong musician and long-term collaborator with Leon Lai, considered one of the best partnerships in the music industry.

description.zh-cn: 美国音乐行政人员，时任索尼音乐娱乐总裁期间促成了黎明加盟新力唱片。
description.en: An American music executive who, as the head of Sony Music Entertainment, facilitated Leon Lai's signing with the label.

description.zh-cn: 香港商人，寰亚音乐创办人，与黎明合作成立A Music。
description.en: A Hong Kong businessman and founder of Media Asia Music, who co-founded Amusic with Leon Lai.

description.zh-cn: 台湾音乐制作人，曾担任黎明概念专辑《一个故事》的监制。
description.en: A Taiwanese record producer who produced Leon Lai's concept album "A Story".

description.zh-cn: 香港电影导演，执导电影《甜蜜蜜》并由黎明担任男主角。
description.en: A Hong Kong film director who directed the movie "Comrades: Almost a Love Story" starring Leon Lai.

description.zh-cn: 大韩民国第16任总统，曾在公开演讲中提及黎明在韩国的知名度。
description.en: The 16th President of the Republic of Korea, who mentioned Leon Lai's fame in Korea during a public speech.

description.zh-cn: 双方因生活理念出现分歧，于2012年发表离婚声明。
description.en: The couple announced their divorce in 2012 due to differing life philosophies.

position.zh-cn: 国际爱心大使、国际青年特使
筹募委员会委员、董事会成员、名誉副会长
position.en: Campaign Committee Member, Board Member, Honorary Vice President

description.zh-cn: 黎明在该比赛中获得铜奖，从而正式进入演艺界。
description.en: Leon Lai won the second runner-up in this competition, which formally launched his career in the entertainment industry.

description.zh-cn: 曾三度向黎明授勋（2003年荣誉勋章、2009年铜紫荆星章、2019年银紫荆星章），以表彰其对慈善公益的贡献。
description.en: Awarded honors to Leon Lai three times (Medal of Honour in 2003, Bronze Bauhinia Star in 2009, Silver Bauhinia Star in 2019) in recognition of his contributions to charity and public service.

description.zh-cn: 作为印尼归国华侨，黎新生在文化大革命期间遭到批斗。
description.en: As a returned overseas Chinese from Indonesia, Lai Sun-sang was persecuted during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 胡枫是黎明的谊父。
description.en: Wu Fung is Leon Lai's godfather.

description.zh-cn: 黎明跟音乐导师韦秀娴学习唱歌。
description.en: Leon Lai learned singing from music tutor Wai Sau-han.

description.zh-cn: 提名黎明参加1986年第五届新秀歌唱大赛。
description.en: Nominated Leon Lai to participate in the 1986 5th New Talent Singing Awards.

description.zh-cn: 在第五届新秀歌唱大赛中担任评判，因认为黎明可塑性大而给予高分。
description.en: As a judge in the 5th New Talent Singing Awards, she gave Leon Lai a high score, believing he had great potential.

description.zh-cn: 将黎明介绍给歌唱老师戴思聪。
description.en: Introduced Leon Lai to singing coach Dai Sicong.

description.zh-cn: 向戴思聪学习乐理知识及歌唱发声技巧。
description.en: Learned music theory and vocal techniques from Dai Sicong.

description.zh-cn: 为黎明向宝丽金唱片公司争取到试音机会，并最终促成签约。
description.en: Secured an audition for Leon Lai with PolyGram Records, which ultimately led to a contract.

description.zh-cn: 作为宝丽金监制，认可黎明的潜质并与他签订了歌手合约。
description.en: As a producer for PolyGram, he recognized Leon Lai's potential and signed a singer contract with him.

description.zh-cn: 在黎明因“走音事件”受批评时，公开分析并肯定其为可造之才。
description.en: When Leon Lai was criticized for an 'off-key incident', he publicly analyzed the situation and affirmed Lai's potential.

description.zh-cn: 曾当面赞赏黎明，并在1993年劲歌金曲颁奖典礼上为他颁发“最受欢迎男歌星”奖。
description.en: Publicly praised Leon Lai and presented him with the 'Most Popular Male Singer' award at the 1993 Jade Solid Gold Best Ten Music Awards Presentation.

description.zh-cn: 到北京中国音乐学院跟金铁霖学习乐理和发声技巧。
description.en: Went to the China Conservatory of Music in Beijing to study music theory and vocal techniques with Jin Tielin.

description.zh-cn: 将音乐人雷颂德介绍给黎明的经理人陈善之，促成了黎明与雷颂德的长期音乐合作。
description.en: Introduced musician Mark Lui to Leon Lai's manager Joe Chan, leading to a long-term musical collaboration between Lai and Lui.

description.zh-cn: 长期音乐合作伙伴，共同创作了大量电子音乐舞曲，被视为乐坛中的最佳拍档之一。
description.en: Long-term musical partners who co-created numerous electronic dance tracks and are considered one of the best duos in the music industry.

description.zh-cn: 作为索尼音乐娱乐的总裁，指示亚太区高层接洽黎明，最终促使其加盟新力唱片。
description.en: As the president of Sony Music Entertainment, he instructed the Asia-Pacific executives to approach Leon Lai, which led to his signing with Sony Music.

description.zh-cn: 与林建岳合作成立唱片公司A Music。
description.en: Collaborated with Peter Lam to establish the record label Amusic.

description.zh-cn: 担任黎明2005年概念专辑《一个故事》的监制。
description.en: Served as the producer for Leon Lai's 2005 concept album 'A Story'.

description.zh-cn: 邀请黎明主演电影《甜蜜蜜》，该片成为其演艺生涯的代表作之一。
description.en: Invited Leon Lai to star in the film 'Comrades: Almost a Love Story', which became one of the signature works of his acting career.

description.zh-cn: 黎明在韩国的广泛知名度，使得时任韩国总统卢武铉在2003年于清华大学的演讲中提及他，以此作为文化交流的例子。
description.en: Leon Lai's widespread fame in South Korea led then-President Roh Moo-hyun to mention him in a 2003 speech at Tsinghua University as an example of cultural exchange.
